specify-data.title: Specify Data
specify-data.description: Specify the data you want to use

continue.heading: Complete online now
continue.description: Now provide all the necessary data and then sign the application digitally to receive your curabox in just a few working days.

continue.heading: Continue later
continue.description: Don't have all the data at hand? No problem. We will email you a link to your address:example@gmail.com which you can use to complete your application online at any time.

continue.heading: Download application
continue.description: Download the application with your previous data as a PDF to print it out, complete any missing information conveniently at home and then send the application back by post or email.

continue.heading: Application received by post
continue.description: Don't have a printer? You will then receive the application with your previous details conveniently by post and send it back to us completely filled out free of charge.

define-delivery.title: Define Delivery
define-delivery.description: Define the delivery of the data

contact-details.title: Contact Details
contact-details.description: Your box is created. Now submit your personal data so that we can contact you for further application and processing of the curabox. After saving your contact details, you can provide all further details at your leisure. You are not submitting an order yet.
